name: Mccain Home Chips 1.5Kg
description: Find us on Facebook and Twitter
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Number_Of_Uses>9 This pack contains 9 ovened servings</Number_Of_Uses><Cooking_Guidelines>Cooking Instructions (General): The following cooking instructions are for 500g of McCain Home Chips. For smaller quantities reduce the cooking time accordingly. For best results cook from frozen. Do not overcook!Oven cook (From Frozen): Preheat the oven to 230째C / 445째F / Gas Mark 8.For fan assisted ovens that's 220째C / 430째F.Spread your McCain Home Chips evenly in a single layer onto a baking tray and pop it into the top of the oven. Bake for 20 - 22 minutes, turning them every now and again, until they're lovely, crisp and light golden.Grill (From Frozen): Remove the rack from the grill pan. Preheat the grill for five minutes at a medium high heat. Place your McCain Home Chips evenly in a single layer onto the grill pan. Grill for 15 minutes, turning them every now and again, until they're lovely, crisp and light golden.</Cooking_Guidelines></Cooking_Instructions>
ingredients: Batter (Wheat Flour (with Calcium, Iron, Niacin, Thiamin), Modified Starch (Maize, Tapioca), Rice Flour, Salt, Corn Starch, Natural Colours (Turmeric Extract, Paprika Extract))
